Container.Name: MemeLord
Container.Overview:
A Python Django Meme Image Board.
Supports file uploads, tagging, commenting and OIDC SSO.
Once the container is up and running, you can access the web portal at `http://YOUR-IP:8000`.
The default username is admin. The default password is auto-generated and displayed in container logs.
Installation Instructions: https://github.com/l4rm4nd/MemeLord/wiki/01-%E2%80%90-Installation#unraid-installation
Container.DonateText: If you like this project, please feel free to donate.

Config.Name: DOMAIN
Config.Description: Defines the FQDN or IP address on which you plan to access the MemeLord container.

Config.Name: SECURE_COOKIES
Config.Description: Set to `True` if you use a reverse proxy with TLS

Config.Name: DB BIND MOUNT DIR
Config.Description: Defines the Docker bind mount volume for persisted database data. Assign proper read+write permissions for the `www-data` user (UID: 33, GID: 33) or execute `chmod -R 777 /mnt/user/appdata/memelord/*` via Unraid terminal shell as root.

Config.Name: MEDIA BIND MOUNT DIR
Config.Description: Defines the Docker bind mount volume for persisted media data. Assign proper read+write permissions for the `www-data` user (UID: 33, GID: 33) or execute `chmod -R 777 /mnt/user/appdata/memelord/*` via Unraid terminal shell as root.
